languages.text: "Меня тревожит, что вы подвергаете свою жизнь пусть и незначительной, но опасности. Но как вам будет угодно".
"What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."
languages.original_text: "Меня тревожит, что вы подвергаете свою жизнь пусть и незначительной, но опасности. Но как вам будет угодно".

traits.locale_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您正把您的生命置于危险之中，这才是让我烦恼的事情。哪怕是最微不足道的危险，您也不该这么做。不过，如您所愿吧。”
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: “您正把您的生命置于危险之中，这才是让我烦恼的事情。哪怕是最微不足道的危险，您也不该这么做。不过，如您所愿吧。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lo que me preocupa es que arriesgue su vida, aunque sea un peligro nimio. Pero se hará lo que desea».
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que me preocupa es que arriesgue su vida, aunque sea un peligro nimio. Pero se hará lo que desea».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我が心配しているのは、あなたが自分の命を危険にさらしていることです…危険性の大小にかかわらず。ですが、お望みとあらばそれを為しましょう」
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: 「我が心配しているのは、あなたが自分の命を危険にさらしていることです…危険性の大小にかかわらず。ですが、お望みとあらばそれを為しましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Was mich beunruhigt, ist die Tatsache, dass Ihr Euer Leben riskiert — ganz gleich, wie vernachlässigbar die Gefahr auch sein mag. Doch wie Ihr wünscht."
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: "Was mich beunruhigt, ist die Tatsache, dass Ihr Euer Leben riskiert — ganz gleich, wie vernachlässigbar die Gefahr auch sein mag. Doch wie Ihr wünscht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ce qui m'inquiète, c'est que vous mettez votre vie en danger, si négligeable le risque puisse-t-il paraître. Bien sûr, la décision, vous revient. »
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui m'inquiète, c'est que vous mettez votre vie en danger, si négligeable le risque puisse-t-il paraître. Bien sûr, la décision, vous revient. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Beni rahatsız eden, hayatınızı tehlikeye atmanız. Tehlikenin büyüklüğü mühim değil. Yine de başüstüne."
languages.original_text: "What troubles me is that you are putting your life at risk — no matter how negligible the danger may be. But as you wish."

traits.locale_text: "Beni rahatsız eden, hayatınızı tehlikeye atmanız. Tehlikenin büyüklüğü mühim değil. Yine de başüstüne."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
